artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded black and white music sheet with the score on the recto and verso; from fashion periodical (P.15,686) that includes a folded hand-colored engraving of a woman in fashionable period dress and a silver serving dish (P.15,684-P.15,685)
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Musical score from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Troisième Année, Troisième Cahier, 20 Mars 1792
